book.synopsis: An In-depth Philosophical Reference Work Furnishes Clear And Reliable Guidance On The Ideas Of Philosophers, Ranging From Antiquity To The Present Day, And The Major Philosophical Systems Around The Globe. The Companion: Alphabetical Entries -- Appendices. Edited By Ted Honderich. Previous Ed.: 1995. Includes Bibliographical References And Index. Also Available Online.
book.title_long: The Oxford Companion To Philosophy Companion To Philosophy Philosophy Oxford Companion To Philosophy (online)
